I only bumped this because you posted a picture of Kronk and not because it was epic or anything.
Well that's why I chose to use Kronk, cuz he's the man!
I read the text on Kronk's picture in Patrick Warburton's voice.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/006/077/so_good.png
My last ranked game with Sion I died on the nexus and killed it with my passive.
The unstoppable backdoor.
I used my ult to get to the nexus in time. Slammed into it with my face.

I don't care which team some people are on but if you pull off something amazing.. even if your on the enemy team I find myself in real life screaming

"OOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!" 

and giving you some honors at the end! xD
If I were playing against you, I wouldn't even be mad. That's awesome.
Question, did you get baron simply because of his passive's ungodly lifesteal?

I died when he was at about 4k hp left. I killed their WW so he couldn't smite it, and then their Bard died because of Baron, Cinderhulk aura, and Gromp buff. Sion's passive is what helped me kill it, because it was a 12,000 HP Baron, and your passive give 100% lifesteal and 10% max health physical damage (**sorry for the confusion, I was wrong about the damage I was dealing, but it was still awesome!**) I didn't have time for my HP to really drain away because I had 5k HP. It was glorious.

Sion's passive is what helped me kill it, because it was a 12,000 HP Baron, and your passive give 100% lifesteal and 10% max health physical damage on hit, so I was doing **~1000 damage every hit until it died**. I didn't have time for my HP to really drain away because I had 5k HP. It was glorious.

Not that I don't believe your story, but sions passive damage is capped verses minions and monsters at 75
Sorry, I forgot that, but this was a true story from a match today and I was VERY excited about this when I was posting. I guess it was even luckier than I thought it was lol!
I've had this exact same experience. Kudos too you man.
What's really fun is ulting in then purposely dodging the enemy to get the inhibitor. they never see it coming. XD
